1.text: Check the care label of the clothing to ensure that it’s safe to wash.

2.text: Allow the glue to dry completely.

3.text: Scrape off as much dried glue as possible.

4.text: Soak the clothing in cold water overnight.

5.text: Apply a drop of liquid laundry detergent to the remaining glue or stain.

6.text: Wash the clothing in the washing machine on a warm setting.

7.text: Dry the clothing when the glue has been removed.

8.text: Read the clothing care label to make sure that it’s machine washable.

9.text: Wait for the glue to dry and check if it can be easily scraped off.

10.text: Spot test acetone nail polish remover on an inside seam.

11.text: Wet a ball of cotton wool with acetone and apply it to the stain.

12.text: Wash the clothing in warm water.

13.text: Dry the clothing once it’s clean.
